entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:40 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:40 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
